Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2013 08:37PM JoyAZ wrote: I am so lucky - have never heard those insensitive, dumb remarks. It was Oct. 1 and I didn't realize it was the beginning of PINK month. My son, d-i-l and I were greeted at our local supermarket by a young man carrying a tray of pink cupcakes. I asked- what's this about? He said - we want you to be aware of breast cancer. My d-i-l rolled her eyes. I'm aware!!!!! (BC since 1998)
